list_definition.definition: to place (a tax, fine, task etc) on someone or something

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The government have imposed a new tax on cigarettes.

list_definition.definition: to force (oneself, one’s opinions etc) on a person

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The headmaster liked to impose his authority on the teachers.

list_definition.definition: (often with on) to ask someone to do something which he should not be asked to do or which he will find difficult to do

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I hope I’m not imposing (on you) by asking you to help.
